page.title: 11HOUSING 1985
page.content: THE MOST COMMON HOUSING IN ARMADLE IS{TERRACED}HOUSING.THERE ARE NO TOWER BLOCKS BUT BIRKENSHAW WAY AND WOODEND WALK HAVE{TWO STORY HIGH FLATS}.IN GLENSIDE GARDENS THERE ARE{BUNGALOWS THE HOUSES IN MILLBURN CRESCENT ARE {SEMI-DETACHED}.WOODEND WALK ALSO HAS TERRACED HOUSING.THERE ARE NO MANSIONS THERE ARE ABOUT 4 FARM HOUSES. SHAW AVENUE HAS THE MOST HOUSES (121 IN ALL). THE{OLDEST}HOUSES ARE IN WOOD TERRACE AND{THE MOST RECENT}ARE AT BATHVILLE CROSS.THE TOTAL NUMBER OF HOUSES IS APPROX. 2552.THE AVERAGE RENT FOR A TWO OR THREE BEDROOMED RENTED HOUSE IS ABOUT Â£18.00 A WEEK. THE NUMBER OF EMPLOYEES INVOLVED IN HOUSE REPAIR IS ABOUT 40.THEY ARE EMPLOYED TO REPAIR DOORS,WINDOWS,SOME PLUMBING DUTIES AND EXTERNAL PAINTWORK.
